title 31-User Cancel Ticket
actor "Customer" as u
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_>: DispatchServlet" as d
entity "<link:_>m : Model" as m
control "<link:_>: TicketSystem" as ts


participant "<link:_>: TicketService" as tes
participant "<link:_>: EventRepository" as er


participant "<link:_>: TicketRepository" as tr
entity "<link:_>: Ticket" as t

==1. The user selects 'Cancel' option for a ticket on their ticket list page (40-view_purchased_tickets.png).==
note over w,d:This part of the functionality is completed in Javascript\nIt does not need to be shown here

==2. The system asks the user to confirm cancellation.==

note over w,d:This part of the functionality is completed in Javascript\nIt does not need to be shown here
== The user selects **Yes** to confirm the cancellation.==


u -> w: click()
activate w
w->d:GET(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d


d ->> ts :  cancelTicket(ticketId : Long, model : Model)
activate ts



ts ->> tes : ticket := getTicket(ticketId: Long)
activate tes






tes->er:e:= findById(id: Long)
 tes -->> ts : return t
 deactivate tes
==3. The service checks if the cancellation is within the allowed time frame.==
ts ->> tes :checkTimeoutCancel(ticketId: Long)
activate tes
alt Cancellation is allowed
  tes->tr:delete(b : Reservation)
  tr->t:<<destroy>>
  destroy t
else Cancellation is not allowed as the deadline has passed.

end




    tes -->> ts : return tickets
    deactivate tes


ts->m: addAttribute("tickets" : String, t : Ticket[*])

ts-->d:return "view_purchased_tickets.html"
deactivate ts

d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv


nv-->d:
deactivate nv

d-->w:return newView
deactivate d
deactivate w
